message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to be offering you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product.  Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,450,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your perspective on the market value.  However, the value of this product goes beyond typical market comparisons. Its unique features and potential for generating significant returns justify a higher price point. I'm willing to come down to $1,325,000. This offer represents a significant concession on my part, while still reflecting the true value of the product.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not convinced that the product is worth $1,325,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,200,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
